Summary: Feb 14th Thursday around 7:00pm 2013, neighbor calls to report a odd light moving over and now hovering above my house.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsFeb 14th Thursday around 7:00pm 2013, neighbor calls to report a odd light moving over house now hovering above, I ran out with camera in hand to look and see a disc about 21 feet long less then 20 feet above my house, the disc blew apart befor my eyes into four smaller orbs of light about 1 to 3 feet, two moved toward south first street, other two moved less than a second passed a neighbors house then was gone. A bigger dark triangle was seen above my house neighbors said I called them to look with me.

There were 5 other sightings in Charlottesville on or around February 14th 2013
